metadata.title: USN-4430-1 -- Pillow vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Pillow incorrectly handled certain image files. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially-crafted image file, a remote attacker could possibly cause Pillow to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4430-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3 python-pil-doc - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3 python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3 python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3 python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.3 No subscription required
